entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is introduced as the elf who has been mistreated by his masters. He is described as having bare feet and batlike ears.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as producing a woolen hat for Dobby.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is introduced as wearing a traveling cloak.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as wearing a large white apron with Skele-Gro in the pocket.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as being wrapped in a borrowed dressing gown and unsteady on her feet.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as putting an arm around Hermione.

entities.name: skele-gro
entities.description: Skele-Gro is introduced as a medicine that Fleur has in her apron pocket.

relationships.description: Dean helps Dobby by producing a woolen hat for him.
Bill is wearing a traveling cloak, but there is no relationship with another entity.
Fleur has Skele-Gro in her apron pocket.
Ron is supporting Hermione by putting an arm around her.
